content.rendered:
You may never think that you yourself would make a commercial, but try to start thinking in an interview as “selling” yourself by making sure you talk about all your attributes and strong points. This quick video will show you how!

<iframe loading="lazy" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/PgQyYX35f04" width="560" height="315" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>

excerpt.rendered: You may never think that you yourself would make a commercial, but try to start thinking in an interview as “selling” yourself by making sure you talk about all your attributes and strong points. This quick video will show you how!
